node.label: ENTRY
node.description: The Entry Point of the script loop

node.label: INRANGE
node.description: The Triggered when an entity enters range

node.label: IF
node.description: Controls the program flow through one of two links depending on whether the Boolean Condition is True or False.

node.label: SWITCH
node.description: Controls the program flow through one of numerous links by comparing the Comparison value with numerous Conditions. If one of the Conditions matches the Comparison Value then the link to the right of that value is executed.

node.label: MORETHAN
node.description: returns true if number A is more than B

node.label: LESSTHAN
node.description: returns true if number A is less than B

node.label: EQUALS
node.description: returns true if number A is equal to B

node.label: FOR
node.description: Repeats the program flow through the Loop executable for the given amount. The index increments the amount defined by the Step value, starting at the Min value and ending at the Max value. Upon completion, the End link is executed, ending the node execution.

node.label: FOREACH
node.description: Repeats the program flow through the Loop executable for each item in the list.

node.label: WHILE
node.description: Repeats the program flow through the Loop executable whilst the Condition is true.

node.label: SEQUENCE
node.description: Allows for multiple actions from one node.

node.label: SETVEC2
node.description: Sets the x and y of a vecto2 entity

node.label: SETSTRING
node.description: Assigns the value of the given string variable

node.label: SETNUM
node.description: Assigns the value of the given number variable

node.label: GETITEM
node.description: Retreives the item within a given array

node.label: ADDITEM
node.description: Adds an item to a given array

node.label: GETPOS
node.description: Gets the position of an entity object

node.label: GETALIGN
node.description: Extract the alignment of the entity object

node.label: VEC2DISTANCE
node.description: Returns the distance between two vec2s

node.label: FORWARDENGINE
node.description: Starts or stops the engines to move the ship forward

node.label: REVERSEENGINE
node.description: Starts or stops the engines to move the ship backwards

node.label: LEFTROTOR
node.description: Starts or stops the rotor to turn the ship anti-clockwise

node.label: RIGHTROTOR
node.description: Starts or stops the rotor to turn the ship clockwise

node.label: FIRE
node.description: Fires the ship weapons, either primary, secondary, or tertiary

node.label: EJECT
node.description: Causes the ship to seft destruct

node.label: STOPMOVE
node.description: Stops the ship from moving and turning

node.label: TURNTO
node.description: Turns the agent ship to face the Vector point

node.label: PLAYER
node.description: Reference to the player entity that spawned this NPC

node.label: SELF
node.description: Reference to the ship object spawned with this NPC
